verbs.description: The bank and tax fraud trial of Paul Manafort , the former campaign chairman of President Donald Trump , [V: was] delayed by two weeks to July 24 in federal court in Alexandria , Virginia . The judge did n’t explain why .

[ARG1: The bank and tax fraud trial of Paul Manafort , the former campaign chairman of President Donald Trump ,] was [V: delayed] [ARG2: by two weeks to July 24] [ARGM-LOC: in federal court in Alexandria , Virginia] . The judge did n’t explain why .
